meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of an adjective.
meanings.sent1: She described the situation adjectivally, focusing on the colors and sizes.
meanings.sent2: He analyzed the painting adjectivally, paying attention to the brush strokes and composition.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked adjectivally, adding flavorful spices and colorful garnishes.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed adjectivally, with harmonious melodies and rhythmic beats.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed adjectivally, displaying vibrant colors and delicate petals.
